methods.name: getMD5Hash
methods.comment: Generate MD5 hash in a hex character representation

return.comment: hex hash value in text format

methods.name: getSaltedMD5Hash
methods.comment:
Generate salted MD5 hash for specified message.  Supplied salt is 
 returned as prefix to returned hash.

params.name: salt
params.comment: digest salt (use empty string for no salt)

return.comment:
salted hash using specified salt which is
 returned as a prefix to the hash

methods.name: getSaltedMD5Hash
methods.comment:
Generate salted MD5 hash for specified message using random salt.  
 First 4-characters of returned hash correspond to the salt data.

return.comment:
salted hash using randomly generated salt which is
 returned as a prefix to the hash

methods.name: getMD5Hash
methods.comment:
Generate MD5 message digest hash for specified input stream.  
 Stream will be read until EOF is reached.

throws.comment: if reading input stream produces an error

methods.name: getMD5Hash
methods.comment: Generate MD5 message digest hash for specified file contents.

throws.comment: if opening or reading file produces an error

methods.name: getMD5Hash
methods.comment:
Generate combined MD5 message digest hash for all values in the 
 specified values list.

methods.name: hexDump
methods.comment: Convert binary data to a sequence of hex characters.
